metadata.title: Free Alexey Malyarevsky
metadata.description: Alexey Malyarevsky, a political prisoner sentenced to 7 years in prison, is a symbol of the ongoing struggle for democracy in Russia.
metadata.ogDescription: Alexey Malyarevsky, a political prisoner sentenced to 7 years in prison, is a symbol of the ongoing struggle for democracy in Russia.
metadata.keywords: Alexey Malyarevsky, Russian political prisoner, Free Alexey Malyarevsky, Russia, democracy, corruption, protest, donation

hero.title: Free Alexey Malyarevsky
hero.subtitle: A programmer was sentenced to 7 years for a solo protest and a $150 donation against corruption.
hero.petitionDescription: Join thousands in demanding justice for Alexey Malyarevsky. Your signature can help bring attention to his case and support the fight for human rights in Russia. Please sign and share with others.

about.title: About Alexey
about.paragraph1: Alexey Malyarevsky, a brave advocate for democracy and transparency in Russia, was sentenced to 7 years in prison on October 23, 2023. His crime? Standing up against corruption and expressing his political views through peaceful protest and a modest $150 donation to Navalny's anti-corruption foundation.
about.paragraph2: This harsh sentence represents a clear violation of human rights and freedom of expression. Alexey's case has become a symbol of the ongoing struggle for democracy in Russia.

location.title: Current Location
location.description: Alexey is currently being held at Correctional Colony No. 1, located in Orenburg, Russia. This high-security facility is known for housing political prisoners.

contactForm.title: Share Information
contactForm.informationPlaceholder: Share any information you have about Alexey...
